property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Tap all Spirits. • Tap all non-Spirit creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The strain upon the veil between worlds began to show near the end of the Kami War. Strange happenings that neither side could control lashed out across Kamigawa." - Observations of the Kami War

property.name: Artist
property.value: Stephen Tappin

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Samurai

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My finest creations are fashioned after the moths of Eiganjo. They fly higher, faster, and more gracefully than any of my own designs." - Noboru, master kitemaker

property.name: Artist
property.value: Anthony S. Waters

property.name: Type
property.value: Legendary Creature

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Kirin Spirit

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, destroy all permanents with that spell's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All bow at its visitation - some in awe, some in honor, some in fear.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Adam Rex

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sweep - Return any number of Plains you control to their owner's hand. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each Plains returned this way.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dany Orizio

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your hand.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Daren Bader

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only during combat after blockers are declared. Target unblocked attacking creature becomes blocked. (This spell works on creatures that can't be blocked.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Paint gold upon the wind, Shape the wind into a shield, And vanish behind the brightness." - Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Soldier

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Descendant of Kiyomaro gets +1/+2 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, you gain 3 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blood of Kiyomaro flows in my veins. He did not let Eiganjo fall and neither shall I."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Christopher Rush

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Soldier

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, return a white creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The air filled with dust and the sound of wingbeats. The mothriders had joined the fray." - Great Battles of Kamigawa

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kev Walker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for an enchantment card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability.)

property.name: Artist
property.value: Daren Bader

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, {T}: You gain 2 life. Channel - {1}{W}, Discard Ghost-Lit Redeemer: You gain 4 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hail of Arrows deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not let a single shaft loose until my word. And when I give that word, do not leave a single shaft in Eiganjo." - General Takeno

property.name: Artist
property.value: Anthony S. Waters

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Samurai

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from black Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sword is just a tool. It is the samurai's hand that brings it to life."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kev Walker

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Samurai

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bushido 2 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It seems that each time I visit Lord Konda his guards are more on edge, perhaps even more eager for the war to reach them." - Masako the Humorless

property.name: Artist
property.value: Brian Snoddy

property.name: Type
property.value: Legendary Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: All artifacts have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay {1}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before the war, we prayed to Kataki to sharpen our swords and harden our armor. Without his blessing our weapons are all but useless against the kami hordes." - Kenzo the Hardhearted

property.name: Artist
property.value: Matt Thompson

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Fox Cleric

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Activate only if you have more cards in hand than each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He kept generations whole before the Kami War, and now he turns his century of wisdom to healing the latest casualties." - Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

property.name: Artist

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Fox Samurai

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Kitsune Dawnblade enters the battlefield, you may tap target creature.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Fox Cleric

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Know your history. The lessons of the past will shield you in times of doubt."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Eric Polak

property.name: Type
property.value: Legendary Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kiyomaro, First to Stand's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. As long as you have four or more cards in hand, Kiyomaro has vigilance. Whenever Kiyomaro deals damage, if you have seven or more cards in hand, you gain 7 life.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kev Walker

property.name: Type
property.value: Legendary Creature

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Advisor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, that player sacrifices a permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Watch over my father. Tell him I'm safe, but I won't come home until I find out how to bring him back to his senses, and Kamigawa is again at peace." - Michiko Konda, last letter to General Takeno

property.name: Artist
property.value: Christopher Moeller

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {W}: Moonwing Moth gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Night wings sprinkled with dust Of a thousand soldiers dead And a thousand cities fallen." - Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

property.value: Franz Vohwinkel

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Nikko-Onna enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment. Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Nikko-Onna to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sweep - Return any number of Plains you control to their owner's hand. Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Plains returned this way.

property.value: Ron Spencer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Humbly I bow. Silently I wait. Deeply I listen."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am not afraid to die today nor afraid of what death will bring."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard cards this turn, return those cards from your graveyard to your hand.
